title: bogdy23
author: bogdy23
content: Hello,I just saw a webinar it was about EMP.MONEY and the boardroom, making 2% a day. My question is if I put money in the boardroom will I be able to grow my let`s say 100$ bank to 102 on the second day, 104.04 on the third day, and so on? Make about 70-80% on my per month? Is this possible can someone please help me in clearing this stuff up what`s possible and what`s not?Thanks a lot
